definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me

sentences.english: With reduced savings, the public has less capital to invest in engineering projects.
sentences.chinese: 結餘額減少了，公衆投資工程項目的資金也就減少了。

sentences.english: Could you tell me my  balance?
sentences.chinese: 能否把存款結餘金額告訴我？

sentences.english: Please complete the table below and select to withdraw in term of units or in percentage of holdings.
sentences.chinese: 請填寫下表並選擇提取單位數目或結餘百份比。

sentences.english: Letter of credit belongs to banker's credit.
sentences.chinese: 我想把旅行信用狀的結餘兌現。

sentences.english: The reform of endowment insurance system has formed immense cumulative balance.
sentences.chinese: 我國城鎮養老保險制度改革形成龐大的基金滾存結餘。

sentences.english: Your balance at the bank is 3,300.00 RMB. 3300
sentences.chinese: 您在本行的結餘是3300元人民幣。

sentences.english: The public has less total savings, because they have paid more in taxes.
sentences.chinese: 公衆的結餘總額減少了，因爲他們必須支付更高的稅。

sentences.english: Perfms the audit balances prepares all wks f audit in an derly fashion.
sentences.chinese: 執行審計結餘，併爲審計工作進行各項有序的準備。

sentences.english: BEA reserves the right to decline any application for balance transfer at its sole discretion.
sentences.chinese: 本行保留絕對權利拒絕任何結餘轉戶之申請。
